# RakNet 3.5 API Documentation

## Overview
This is a Markdown reference for the RakNet 3.5 API (External/RakNet3.5). It de-glosses the public headers and presents Unreal-style class pages with signatures and header-based summaries.

## Start Here
- [Quick Start](Guides/QuickStart.md)
- [Modules](Modules.md)
- [Class Index](ClassIndex.md)

## Documentation Layout
- Guides: `Docs/External/RakNet3.5/Guides/`
- Indexes: `Modules.md`, `ClassIndex.md`

## Source Headers
Authoritative headers live under `External/RakNet3.5/Source/`.

- [Quick Start](Guides/QuickStart.md)

- [Plugins and Callbacks](Guides/Plugins.md)
- [Security and Encryption](Guides/Security.md)
- [Replication (ReplicaManager/ReplicaManager2)](Guides/Replication.md)
